sentences.sContent: Her cleverness and talent helped her look more beautiful than ever.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her cleverness and talent helped her look more beautiful than ever.
sentences.sCn: 她的聪明才智使她更显得美貌非凡。

sentences.sContent: But that brings us back to the excessive cleverness (and opacity) that we hope to avoid.
sentences.sContent_eng: But that brings us back to the excessive cleverness (and opacity) that we hope to avoid.
sentences.sCn: 但是这又让我们回到了希望避免的聪明过度（和不透明性）上。

sentences.sContent: Between cleverness and wisdom, I prefer the latter.
sentences.sContent_eng: Between cleverness and wisdom, I prefer the latter.
sentences.sCn: 在聪明与智慧之间我更喜欢后者。
